hooks.name: continuation-check
hooks.description: Evaluates completion status and blocks premature stopping when tasks remain

hooks.name: lint-changed
hooks.description: Runs ESLint after Write/Edit on JavaScript/TypeScript files

hooks.name: typecheck-changed
hooks.description: Runs TypeScript type checking after Write/Edit on .ts/.tsx files

hooks.name: checkpoint
hooks.description: Creates git stash checkpoint before session ends if uncommitted changes exist

hooks.name: thinking-level
hooks.description: Detects complex tasks and adds reasoning enhancement instructions

hooks.name: cost-warning
hooks.description: Warns when approaching daily cost budget based on token usage

hooks.name: security-scan
hooks.description: Scans for secrets before git commits

hooks.name: test-reminder
hooks.description: Reminds to run tests after code changes

hooks.name: git-branch-check
hooks.description: Warns when committing to main/master branches

hooks.name: todo-tracker
hooks.description: Tracks TODO items mentioned in prompts

hooks.name: session-log
hooks.description: Logs session summary when Claude stops

hooks.name: team-lifecycle
hooks.description: Logs team creation and shutdown events for native Claude Code Teams

hooks.name: swarm-cost-tracker
hooks.description: Tracks per-agent costs when Task tool is used for orchestration

hooks.name: convention-check
hooks.description: Checks file writes against project conventions and warns on violations

hooks.name: session-learner
hooks.description: Captures learnings from resolved problems in Claude Code sessions

hooks.name: learning-retriever
hooks.description: Retrieves relevant past learnings and injects them as context
